text: Jon Luke Kirby (born 23 September 1998) is a rugby league footballer who plays as a or forward for the Huddersfield Giants in the Betfred Super League. In 2019 he made his Super League début for Huddersfield against Hull F.C.. ==References== ==External links== *Huddersfield Giants profile Category:Living people Category:Rugby league props Category:Rugby league second-rows Category:Huddersfield Giants players Category:1998 births
title: Jon Luke Kirby
